00020 #define SH(p)((unsigned short)(unsigned char)((p)[0]) | ((unsigned short)(unsigned char)((p)[1]) << 8))
00021 #define LG(p)((unsigned long)(SH(p)) |((unsigned long)(SH((p)+2)) << 16))
00022 #endif

00028 template <class T> inline T _max(T x, T y) { return(x > y) ? x : y; }
00029 template <class T> inline T* _resize(T* ptr, size_t n, size_t l, T v) {
00030   T *tmp = new T[l];
00031   for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) tmp[i] = ptr[i];
00032   for (size_t i = n; i < l; ++i) tmp[i] = v;
00033   delete [] ptr;
00034   return tmp;
00035 }
00036 
00037 template <class T>
00038 class Length {
00039  public: size_t operator()(const T *key) const
00040   { size_t i; for (i = 0; key[i] != (T)0; ++i) {} return i; }
00041 };
00042 
00043 template <> class Length<char> {
00044  public: size_t operator()(const char *key) const
00045   { return std::strlen(key); }
00046 };
00047 
00048 template  <class node_type_,  class node_u_type_,
00049            class array_type_, class array_u_type_,
00050            class length_func_ = Length<node_type_> >
00051 class DoubleArrayImpl {
00052  private:
00053 
00054   struct node_t {
00055     array_u_type_ code;
00056     size_t     depth;
00057     size_t     left;
00058     size_t     right;
00059   };
00060 
00061   struct unit_t {
00062     array_type_   base;
00063     array_u_type_ check;
00064   };
00065 
00066   unit_t        *array_;
00067   unsigned char *used_;
00068   size_t        size_;
00069   size_t        alloc_size_;
00070   node_type_    **key_;
00071   size_t        key_size_;
00072   size_t        *length_;
00073   array_type_   *value_;
00074   size_t        progress_;
00075   size_t        next_check_pos_;
00076   bool          no_delete_;
00077   int           error_;
00078   int (*progress_func_)(size_t, size_t);
00079 
00080   size_t resize(const size_t new_size) {
00081     unit_t tmp;
00082     tmp.base = 0;
00083     tmp.check = 0;
00084     array_ = _resize(array_, alloc_size_, new_size, tmp);
00085     used_  = _resize(used_, alloc_size_, new_size,
00086                      static_cast<unsigned char>(0));
00087     alloc_size_ = new_size;
00088     return new_size;
00089   }
00090 
00091   size_t fetch(const node_t &parent, std::vector <node_t> &siblings) {
00092     if (error_ < 0) return 0;
00093 
00094     array_u_type_ prev = 0;
00095 
00096     for (size_t i = parent.left; i < parent.right; ++i) {
00097       if ((length_ ? length_[i] : length_func_()(key_[i])) < parent.depth)
00098         continue;
00099 
00100       const node_u_type_ *tmp = reinterpret_cast<node_u_type_ *>(key_[i]);
00101 
00102       array_u_type_ cur = 0;
00103       if ((length_ ? length_[i] : length_func_()(key_[i])) != parent.depth)
00104         cur = (array_u_type_)tmp[parent.depth] + 1;
00105 
00106       if (prev > cur) {
00107         error_ = -3;
00108         return 0;
00109       }
00110 
00111       if (cur != prev || siblings.empty()) {
00112         node_t tmp_node;
00113         tmp_node.depth = parent.depth + 1;
00114         tmp_node.code  = cur;
00115         tmp_node.left  = i;
00116         if (!siblings.empty()) siblings[siblings.size()-1].right = i;
00117 
00118         siblings.push_back(tmp_node);
00119       }
00120 
00121       prev = cur;
00122     }
00123 
00124     if (!siblings.empty())
00125       siblings[siblings.size()-1].right = parent.right;
00126 
00127     return siblings.size();
00128   }
00129 
00130   size_t insert(const std::vector <node_t> &siblings) {
00131     if (error_ < 0) return 0;
00132 
00133     size_t begin = 0;
00134     size_t pos   = _max((size_t)siblings[0].code + 1, next_check_pos_) - 1;
00135     size_t nonzero_num = 0;
00136     int    first = 0;
00137 
00138     if (alloc_size_ <= pos) resize(pos + 1);
00139 
00140     while (true) {
00141    next:
00142       ++pos;
00143 
00144       if (alloc_size_ <= pos) resize(pos + 1);
00145 
00146       if (array_[pos].check) {
00147         ++nonzero_num;
00148         continue;
00149       } else if (!first) {
00150         next_check_pos_ = pos;
00151         first = 1;
00152       }
00153 
00154       begin = pos - siblings[0].code;
00155       if (alloc_size_ <= (begin + siblings[siblings.size()-1].code))
00156         resize(static_cast<size_t>(alloc_size_ *
00157                                    _max(1.05, 1.0 * key_size_ / progress_)));
00158 
00159       if (used_[begin]) continue;
00160 
00161       for (size_t i = 1; i < siblings.size(); ++i)
00162         if (array_[begin + siblings[i].code].check != 0) goto next;
00163 
00164       break;
00165     }
00166 
00167     // -- Simple heuristics --
00168     // if the percentage of non-empty contents in check between the index
00169     // 'next_check_pos' and 'check' is greater than some constant
00170     // value(e.g. 0.9),
00171     // new 'next_check_pos' index is written by 'check'.
00172     if (1.0 * nonzero_num/(pos - next_check_pos_ + 1) >= 0.95)
00173       next_check_pos_ = pos;
00174 
00175     used_[begin] = 1;
00176     size_ = _max(size_,
00177                  begin +
00178                  static_cast<size_t>(siblings[siblings.size() - 1].code + 1));
00179 
00180     for (size_t i = 0; i < siblings.size(); ++i)
00181       array_[begin + siblings[i].code].check = begin;
00182 
00183     for (size_t i = 0; i < siblings.size(); ++i) {
00184       std::vector <node_t> new_siblings;
00185 
00186       if (!fetch(siblings[i], new_siblings)) {
00187         array_[begin + siblings[i].code].base =
00188             value_ ?
00189             static_cast<array_type_>(-value_[siblings[i].left]-1) :
00190             static_cast<array_type_>(-siblings[i].left-1);
00191 
00192         if (value_ && (array_type_)(-value_[siblings[i].left]-1) >= 0) {
00193           error_ = -2;
00194           return 0;
00195         }
00196 
00197         ++progress_;
00198         if (progress_func_)(*progress_func_)(progress_, key_size_);
00199 
00200       } else {
00201         size_t h = insert(new_siblings);
00202         array_[begin + siblings[i].code].base = h;
00203       }
00204     }
00205 
00206     return begin;
00207   }
00208 
00209  public:

00211   typedef array_type_  value_type;
00212   typedef node_type_   key_type;
00213   typedef array_type_  result_type;  // for compatibility
00214 
00215   struct result_pair_type {
00216     value_type value;
00217     size_t     length;
00218   };

00220   explicit DoubleArrayImpl(): array_(0), used_(0),
00221                               size_(0), alloc_size_(0),
00222                               no_delete_(0), error_(0) {}
00223   ~DoubleArrayImpl() { clear(); }
00224 
00225   void set_result(value_type& x, value_type r, size_t) {
00226     x = r;
00227   }
00228 
00229   void set_result(result_pair_type& x, value_type r, size_t l) {
00230     x.value = r;
00231     x.length = l;
00232   }
00233 
00234   void set_array(void *ptr, size_t size = 0) {
00235     clear();
00236     array_ = reinterpret_cast<unit_t *>(ptr);
00237     no_delete_ = true;
00238     size_ = size;
00239   }
00240 
00241   const void *array() const {
00242     return const_cast<const void *>(reinterpret_cast<void *>(array_));
00243   }
00244 
00245   void clear() {
00246     if (!no_delete_)
00247       delete [] array_;
00248     delete [] used_;
00249     array_ = 0;
00250     used_ = 0;
00251     alloc_size_ = 0;
00252     size_ = 0;
00253     no_delete_ = false;
00254   }
00255 
00256   size_t unit_size()  const { return sizeof(unit_t); }
00257   size_t size()       const { return size_; }
00258   size_t total_size() const { return size_ * sizeof(unit_t); }
00259 
00260   size_t nonzero_size() const {
00261     size_t result = 0;
00262     for (size_t i = 0; i < size_; ++i)
00263       if (array_[i].check) ++result;
00264     return result;
00265   }
00266 
00267   int build(size_t     key_size,
00268             key_type   **key,
00269             size_t     *length = 0,
00270             value_type *value = 0,
00271             int (*progress_func)(size_t, size_t) = 0) {
00272     if (!key_size || !key) return 0;
00273 
00274     progress_func_ = progress_func;
00275     key_           = key;
00276     length_        = length;
00277     key_size_      = key_size;
00278     value_         = value;
00279     progress_      = 0;
00280 
00281     resize(8192);
00282 
00283     array_[0].base = 1;
00284     next_check_pos_ = 0;
00285 
00286     node_t root_node;
00287     root_node.left  = 0;
00288     root_node.right = key_size;
00289     root_node.depth = 0;
00290 
00291     std::vector <node_t> siblings;
00292     fetch(root_node, siblings);
00293     insert(siblings);
00294 
00295     size_ += (1 << 8 * sizeof(key_type)) + 1;
00296     if (size_ >= alloc_size_) resize(size_);
00297 
00298     delete [] used_;
00299     used_ = 0;
00300 
00301     return error_;
00302   }
00303 
00304   int open(const char *file,
00305            const char *mode = "rb",
00306            size_t offset = 0,
00307            size_t size = 0) {
00308     std::FILE *fp = std::fopen(file, mode);
00309     if (!fp) return -1;
00310     if (std::fseek(fp, offset, SEEK_SET) != 0) return -1;
00311 
00312     if (!size) {
00313       if (std::fseek(fp, 0L,     SEEK_END) != 0) return -1;
00314       size = std::ftell(fp);
00315       if (std::fseek(fp, offset, SEEK_SET) != 0) return -1;
00316     }
00317 
00318     clear();
00319 
00320     size_ = size;
00321     size_ /= sizeof(unit_t);
00322     array_ = new unit_t[size_];
00323     if (size_ != std::fread(reinterpret_cast<unit_t *>(array_),
00324                             sizeof(unit_t), size_, fp)) return -1;
00325     std::fclose(fp);
00326 
00327     return 0;
00328   }
00329 
00330   int save(const char *file,
00331            const char *mode = "wb",
00332            size_t offset = 0) {
00333     if (!size_) return -1;
00334     std::FILE *fp = std::fopen(file, mode);
00335     if (!fp) return -1;
00336     if (size_ != std::fwrite(reinterpret_cast<unit_t *>(array_),
00337                              sizeof(unit_t), size_, fp))
00338       return -1;
00339     std::fclose(fp);
00340     return 0;
00341   }

00343 #ifdef HAVE_ZLIB_H
00344   int gzopen(const char *file,
00345              const char *mode = "rb",
00346              size_t offset = 0,
00347              size_t size = 0) {
00348     std::FILE *fp  = std::fopen(file, mode);
00349     if (!fp) return -1;
00350     clear();
00351 
00352     size_ = size;
00353     if (!size_) {
00354       if (-1L != static_cast<long>(std::fseek(fp, -8, SEEK_END))) {
00355         char buf[8];
00356         if (std::fread(static_cast<char*>(buf),
00357                        1, 8, fp) != sizeof(buf)) {
00358           std::fclose(fp);
00359           return -1;
00360         }
00361         size_ = LG(buf+4);
00362         size_ /= sizeof(unit_t);
00363       }
00364     }
00365     std::fclose(fp);
00366 
00367     if (!size_) return -1;
00368 
00369     zlib::gzFile gzfp = zlib::gzopen(file, mode);
00370     if (!gzfp) return -1;
00371     array_ = new unit_t[size_];
00372     if (zlib::gzseek(gzfp, offset, SEEK_SET) != 0) return -1;
00373     zlib::gzread(gzfp, reinterpret_cast<unit_t *>(array_),
00374                  sizeof(unit_t) * size_);
00375     zlib::gzclose(gzfp);
00376     return 0;
00377   }
00378 
00379   int gzsave(const char *file, const char *mode = "wb",
00380              size_t offset = 0) {
00381     zlib::gzFile gzfp = zlib::gzopen(file, mode);
00382     if (!gzfp) return -1;
00383     zlib::gzwrite(gzfp, reinterpret_cast<unit_t *>(array_),
00384                   sizeof(unit_t) * size_);
00385     zlib::gzclose(gzfp);
00386     return 0;
00387   }
00388 #endif

00390   template <class T>
00391   inline void exactMatchSearch(const key_type *key,
00392                                T & result,
00393                                size_t len = 0,
00394                                size_t node_pos = 0) {
00395     result = exactMatchSearch<T>(key, len, node_pos);
00396     return;
00397   }
00398 
00399   template <class T>
00400   inline T exactMatchSearch(const key_type *key,
00401                             size_t len = 0,
00402                             size_t node_pos = 0) {
00403     if (!len) len = length_func_()(key);
00404 
00405     T result;
00406     set_result(result, -1, 0);
00407 
00408     register array_type_  b = array_[node_pos].base;
00409     register array_u_type_ p;
00410 
00411     for (register size_t i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
00412       p = b +(node_u_type_)(key[i]) + 1;
00413       if (static_cast<array_u_type_>(b) == array_[p].check)
00414         b = array_[p].base;
00415       else
00416         return result;
00417     }
00418 
00419     p = b;
00420     array_type_ n = array_[p].base;
00421     if (static_cast<array_u_type_>(b) == array_[p].check && n < 0)
00422       set_result(result, -n-1, len);
00423 
00424     return result;
00425   }
00426 
00427   template <class T>
00428   size_t commonPrefixSearch(const key_type *key,
00429                             T* result,
00430                             size_t result_len,
00431                             size_t len = 0,
00432                             size_t node_pos = 0) {
00433     if (!len) len = length_func_()(key);
00434 
00435     register array_type_  b   = array_[node_pos].base;
00436     register size_t     num = 0;
00437     register array_type_  n;
00438     register array_u_type_ p;
00439 
00440     for (register size_t i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
00441       p = b;  // + 0;
00442       n = array_[p].base;
00443       if ((array_u_type_) b == array_[p].check && n < 0) {
00444         // result[num] = -n-1;
00445         if (num < result_len) set_result(result[num], -n-1, i);
00446         ++num;
00447       }
00448 
00449       p = b +(node_u_type_)(key[i]) + 1;
00450       if ((array_u_type_) b == array_[p].check)
00451         b = array_[p].base;
00452       else
00453         return num;
00454     }
00455 
00456     p = b;
00457     n = array_[p].base;
00458 
00459     if ((array_u_type_)b == array_[p].check && n < 0) {
00460       if (num < result_len) set_result(result[num], -n-1, len);
00461       ++num;
00462     }
00463 
00464     return num;
00465   }
00466 
00467   value_type traverse(const key_type *key,
00468                       size_t &node_pos,
00469                       size_t &key_pos,
00470                       size_t len = 0) {
00471     if (!len) len = length_func_()(key);
00472 
00473     register array_type_  b = array_[node_pos].base;
00474     register array_u_type_ p;
00475 
00476     for (; key_pos < len; ++key_pos) {
00477       p = b +(node_u_type_)(key[key_pos]) + 1;
00478       if (static_cast<array_u_type_>(b) == array_[p].check) {
00479         node_pos = p;
00480         b = array_[p].base;
00481       } else {
00482         return -2;  // no node
00483       }
00484     }
00485 
00486     p = b;
00487     array_type_ n = array_[p].base;
00488     if (static_cast<array_u_type_>(b) == array_[p].check && n < 0)
00489       return -n-1;
00490 
00491     return -1;  // found, but no value
00492   }
00493 };
